name: Hazardous
description:
In an alternate reality, people kept destroying the resources of the world recklessly. Demolished the forests, polluted the seas, thus climate change was inevitable. Eventually the planet reacted to the overconsumption of the people and took the action to protect it's own existence.
The planet started to punish the mankind with disasters, diseases and resource shortages. Adaptex, a company dedicated to adapt the human life to the future, provided people with some new technlogical advancements. With these advencements, there were three choices left for people:

Biogenica


A group of people used the CRISPR-Cas genetic modifications and tried to adapt to the new condition of the world but they were too impetuous asa result they were turned into hostile mutants.

Cybernexus

Another group of people adapted the cybernetic into their bodies and became physically stronger but this power made them overbearing.

Ovesis Metaverse


People who didn't want to associate with Adaptex decided to join the Ovesis Metaverse to secure the resources and live in a sustainable way. This virtual world merge the consciousnesses of the individuals and create a collective mind.

You're a wanderer accidentaly found yourself in this reality and trying get to the portal that will take you to your own realm. May you succeed in your journey.


In the game there are certain hazards that you're supposed to overcome with certain items. Kill your enemies, loot their bodies and craft the items you need with that you have.
